spanGrp.span: When a boy comes to engage a girl, there are only very close people at her place.
oki oğlan gälier ğızi nišanmaa aa ävdä täk äp bizım halhtır
Only your very close relatives should be there.
äpsındän yahın hısım sänä sänä olajahtır orda
They put an icon on the table and in front of that they put rings.
stola ğoierlär ikonai onun ogündä ğoierlär üzükläri
Then when betrothed give glasses with drinks, they should put atop something sweet.
aa soradan oki aa nišannar verierlär čaškalari üstünä ğoyajahlar biše datli
They can put a bar of chocolate atop.
olur plitkada üstünä ğoimah ki plitkainan ki datliinän veren bu šei čaškalari
And then when they say a toast they put money in a glass.
i soradan onnar oki ičerlär sağlıgi ičınä ğoerlär pul
Boy’s father gives this glass to a girl.
i ba oğlanın babasi ğıza verier bu čaškai
And the girl’s father gives it to the boy.
Then they give rings to each other and get engaged.
am hm soradan nu olier nišan tahierlär üzükläri
